iris.imageToBitcode
Class UnWrapper

java.lang.Object
  iris.imageToBitcode.UnWrapper

public class UnWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Extracts and unwraps an iris from an eye image, given the iris inner and outer boundaries

Version:
1.0
Author:
Arnar B. Jonsson

Method Detail

unWrap

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage unWrap(java.awt.image.BufferedImage eyeImage,
                                                  EyeDataType eyeData,
                                                  int unwrHeight,
                                                  int unwrWidth,
                                                  int overWrap)
Unwrap an iris image

Parameters:
eyeImage - original image of an eye
eyeData - holds the size and location of the pupil and iris
unwrHeight - the width (in pixels) of the unwrapped iris image
unwrWidth - the height (in pixels) of the unwrapped iris image
overWrap - is the size (in pixels) of the duplication of the iris image
Returns:
the unwrapped iris as a BufferedImage

unWrapByteArr

public int[][] unWrapByteArr(java.awt.image.BufferedImage eyeImage,
                             EyeDataType ed,
                             int unwrHeight,
                             int unwrWidth,
                             int overWrap)
Returns an unwrapped iris as a two dimensional array of integers

Parameters:
eyeImage - original image of an eye
ed - the location of the pupil and iris in an EyeDataType
unwrHeight - the width (in pixels) of the unwrapped iris image
unwrWidth - the height (in pixels) of the unwrapped iris image
overWrap - is the extra rotation past 360 degrees in pixel (like x)
Returns:
the unwrapped iris

rPup - radius of pupil
xIris - center point of iris (x)
yIris - center point of iris (y)
rIris - radius of iris
unwrHeight - the width (in pixels) of the unwrapped iris image
unwrWidth - the height (in pixels) of the unwrapped iris image

the unwrapped iris

rIris - radius of iris
